body:
Day 9 - Manga 79
The art started not being that shitty but it got to a point were looking at it gave me a fight or run instinct.
1/10
pretty bad, nothing of note again and the art is still garbage, 1/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me.
